languages.text: "Когда я очнулся на Фенрисе, то сразу отправился в пустоши, выследил черногривого волка и убил его голыми руками. За сей подвиг мне было даровано звание Волчьего гвардейца". {n}Ладонь Ульфара заботливо гладит волчью шкуру, покрывающей его плечи.{/n} "Тот грозный зверь отныне всюду со мной, я несу его яростный дух".

"When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."
languages.original_text: "Когда я очнулся на Фенрисе, то сразу отправился в пустоши, выследил черногривого волка и убил его голыми руками. За сей подвиг мне было даровано звание Волчьего гвардейца". {n}Ладонь Ульфара заботливо гладит волчью шкуру, покрывающей его плечи.{/n} "Тот грозный зверь отныне всюду со мной, я несу его яростный дух".

For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

"When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

languages.text: “我在芬里斯醒来之后，就立刻动身去了荒野。在那里，我遇到了一头黑鬃恶狼，赤手空拳地杀了它。因为这样的壮举，我赢得了野狼守卫的头衔。”{n}乌尔法深情地抚摸着披在他肩上的狼皮。{/n}“那头可怕的野狼至今仍陪在我身边，它狂怒的魂魄与我同在。”
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: “我在芬里斯醒来之后，就立刻动身去了荒野。在那里，我遇到了一头黑鬃恶狼，赤手空拳地杀了它。因为这样的壮举，我赢得了野狼守卫的头衔。”{n}乌尔法深情地抚摸着披在他肩上的狼皮。{/n}“那头可怕的野狼至今仍陪在我身边，它狂怒的魂魄与我同在。”

languages.text: «Cuando desperté en Fenris, marché de inmediato a los páramos, donde cacé a un lobo de melena negra y lo maté con mis propias manos. Fue así como obtuve el rango de Guardia del Lobo». {n}Ulfar acaricia afectuosamente la piel de lobo que lleva sobre los hombros.{/n} «Esa temible bestia aún me acompaña a día de hoy y llevo su espíritu furibundo conmigo».
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando desperté en Fenris, marché de inmediato a los páramos, donde cacé a un lobo de melena negra y lo maté con mis propias manos. Fue así como obtuve el rango de Guardia del Lobo». {n}Ulfar acaricia afectuosamente la piel de lobo que lleva sobre los hombros.{/n} «Esa temible bestia aún me acompaña a día de hoy y llevo su espíritu furibundo conmigo».

languages.text: 「フェンリスで目覚めたとき、俺はすぐに荒れ地へと旅立った。そして俺は、そこでブラックメイン・ウルフを狩り、素手でその生命を断った。その功績により、俺はウルフガードの位を授かった"のさ」{n}うるファーは殻にかけた狼の毛皮を愛おしそうに撫でる。{/n}「その恐ろしい獣は今日まで俺の手元にあり、俺は彼の激しい魂を受け継いでいる」
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスで目覚めたとき、俺はすぐに荒れ地へと旅立った。そして俺は、そこでブラックメイン・ウルフを狩り、素手でその生命を断った。その功績により、俺はウルフガードの位を授かった"のさ」{n}うるファーは殻にかけた狼の毛皮を愛おしそうに撫でる。{/n}「その恐ろしい獣は今日まで俺の手元にあり、俺は彼の激しい魂を受け継いでいる」

languages.text: "Als ich auf Fenris erwachte, machte ich mich augenblicklich auf den Weg in die Einöden, wo ich einen schwarzmähnigen Wolf jagte und mit bloßen Händen tötete. Dafür wurde ich in den Rang eines Wolfsgardisten erhoben." {n}Ulfar streichelt liebevoll über das Wolfsfell, das über seine Schultern gelegt ist.{/n} "Dieses furchterregende Untier ist noch heute bei mir, und ich trage seinen wilden Geist."
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich auf Fenris erwachte, machte ich mich augenblicklich auf den Weg in die Einöden, wo ich einen schwarzmähnigen Wolf jagte und mit bloßen Händen tötete. Dafür wurde ich in den Rang eines Wolfsgardisten erhoben." {n}Ulfar streichelt liebevoll über das Wolfsfell, das über seine Schultern gelegt ist.{/n} "Dieses furchterregende Untier ist noch heute bei mir, und ich trage seinen wilden Geist."

languages.text: « Lorsque je me suis réveillé sur Fenris, je me suis rendu immédiatement dans les étendues sauvages et j'y ai chassé un loup à crinière noire que j'ai tué à mains nues. Pour cet exploit, j'ai reçu le grade de Garde Loup. » {n}Ulfar caresse avec affection la fourrure de loup disposée sur ses épaules.{/n} « Cette bête féroce ne m'a pas quitté depuis. Son esprit furieux m'accompagne partout. »
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque je me suis réveillé sur Fenris, je me suis rendu immédiatement dans les étendues sauvages et j'y ai chassé un loup à crinière noire que j'ai tué à mains nues. Pour cet exploit, j'ai reçu le grade de Garde Loup. » {n}Ulfar caresse avec affection la fourrure de loup disposée sur ses épaules.{/n} « Cette bête féroce ne m'a pas quitté depuis. Son esprit furieux m'accompagne partout. »

languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

languages.text: "Fenris'te gözlerimi açtığımda hemen çoraklara gidip bir karayele kurdunu çıplak ellerimle avladım. Bu karşılaşma sayesinde Kurt Muhafız kademesini yükseldim." {n}Ulfar, omuzlarındaki kurt kürkünü şefkatle okşuyor.{/n} "O korkunç canavar ve onun öfkeli ruhu, bugüne dahi benimle."
languages.original_text: "When I awoke on Fenris, I set out for the wastes at once, and there I hunted a blackmaned wolf and killed it with my bare hands. For that feat, I was granted the rank of Wolf Guard." {n}Ulfar affectionately strokes the wolf fur laid across his shoulders.{/n} "That fearsome beast remains with me to this day, and I carry his furious spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Fenris'te gözlerimi açtığımda hemen çoraklara gittim ve bir karayele kurdunu çıplak ellerimle avladım. Bu karşılaşma sayesinde Kurt Muhafız kademesini kazandım." {n}Ulfar, omuzlarındaki kurt kürkünü şefkatle okşuyor.{/n} "O korkunç canavar ve onun öfkeli ruhu bugüne dek her gün benimle."
